Room.Name: Orchard Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Orchard Lane, north of the Ministry of Tranquility.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Ministries are located on the southern block, south of Orchard Lane. Directly to the south is the Ministry of Tranquility, which is in charge of domestic peace. The Tranquility Patrol is run from this facility.
